thread.title: Mr Neal Walsall
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Mr Neal Walsall

author: Mr Neal Walsall
title: Mr Neal Walsall
text: Tyres ordered at 4pm Friday fitted by 10 am Saturday all without leaving the house. It's impossible to fault service like that. This is the 4th time I've used this company for tyres. Fitter is always prompt, polite and gets on with the job no messing about.
